Title: Preliminary Discussion of Blockchain Application in Satellite Remote Sensing Data Share
abstract: Satellite remote sensing data is high-valuable in scientific research and commercial application. China is a world-leader in satellite remote sensing, however the data resources are highly concentrated in few institutions and the data distribution is centralized and separated. As blockchain applies more widely, it offers a new way for satellite remote sensing data sharing. This paper analyzes the feasibility of combining blockchain and satellite remote sensing data sharing, tying to finds out the binding point by analyzing the satellite remote sensing data structure. Comparing satellite remote sensing data entity and derived data, this article proposes a preliminary design and architecture of blockchain to share satellite remote sensing metadata. At last an analysis of advantages and challenges is given.
